title: Fort Stanwix National Monument: Ask a Ranger
body: Ask a Ranger          DO YOU HAVE A QUESTION?  Have you or your family been to Fort Stanwix National Monument recently, or are you planning a trip?  Have you visited another National Park Service site and just forgot to ask what that weird thing you saw was before you left the visitor center?  Kids, parents, and guardians, just Email a Ranger here at Fort Stanwix and we'll try our best to answer your questions, or we'll send them along to someone who can!  Any kids who have a question must have their parents or guardians send in the questions for them.
